edu.unika.aifb.rdf.api.syntax
Class RDFParser

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      edu.unika.aifb.rdf.api.syntax.RDFParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
RDFConstants, org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
public class RDFParser
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
implements RDFConstants

This class parses the RDF according to the syntax specified in http://www.w3.org/TR/rdf-syntax-grammar/.

getIDNodeIDAboutResourceURI

protected java.lang.String getIDNodeIDAboutResourceURI(org.xml.sax.Attributes atts)
                                                throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
Extracts the URI of the resource from rdf:ID, rdf:nodeID or rdf:about attribute. If no attribute is found, an URI is generated.

Throws:
org.xml.sax.SAXException

getNodeIDResourceResourceURI

protected java.lang.String getNodeIDResourceResourceURI(org.xml.sax.Attributes atts)
                                                 throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
Extracts the URI of the resource from rdf:resource or rdf:nodeID attribute. If no attribute is found, null is returned.

Parameters:
atts - the attributes
Returns:
the URI of the resource or null
Throws:
org.xml.sax.SAXException

statementWithResourceValue

protected void statementWithResourceValue(java.lang.String subject,
                                          java.lang.String predicate,
                                          java.lang.String object,
                                          java.lang.String reificationID)
                                   throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
Called when a statement with resource value is added to the model.

Parameters:
subject - URI of the subject resource
predicate - URI of the predicate resource
object - URI of the object resource
reificationID - if not null, contains URI of the resource that will wold the reified statement
Throws:
org.xml.sax.SAXException

statementWithLiteralValue

protected void statementWithLiteralValue(java.lang.String subject,
                                         java.lang.String predicate,
                                         java.lang.String object,
                                         java.lang.String dataType,
                                         java.lang.String reificationID)
                                  throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
Called when a statement with literal value is added to the model.

Parameters:
subject - URI of the subject resource
predicate - URI of the predicate resource
object - literal object value
dataType - the URI of the literal's datatype (may be null)
reificationID - if not null, contains URI of the resource that will wold the reified statement
Throws:
org.xml.sax.SAXException

isAnonymousNodeURI

public boolean isAnonymousNodeURI(java.lang.String uri)
Tests whether supplied URI was generated by this parser in order to label an anonymous node.

Parameters:
uri - the URI
Returns:
true if the URI was generated by this parser to label an anonymous node
